name: bthwani-monorepo
description: Bthwani API Platform - Unified SDK Generation

scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:openapi && npm run generate:sdks
scripts.generate:sdk:admin: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i openapi.yaml -o admin-dashboard/src/api/generated
scripts.generate:sdk:web: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-fetch -i openapi.yaml -o bthwani-web/src/api/generated
scripts.generate:sdk:user: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i openapi.yaml -o app-user/src/api/generated
scripts.generate:sdk:vendor: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i openapi.yaml -o vendor-app/src/api/generated
scripts.generate:sdk:rider: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i openapi.yaml -o rider-app/src/api/generated
scripts.generate:sdk:marketer: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i openapi.yaml -o field-marketers/src/api/generated
scripts.audit:production: NODE_ENV=production HTTP_PROXY= HTTPS_PROXY= DISABLE_EXTERNAL_APIS=true npm run audit:all
